bug.author: leitoxve
bug.summary: Parameter not valid or out of range. (Message from the source: Error Inquire buffer info) (ID: -1009)
bug.description: I have done the code example in python and I have problems calling the function ia.fetch_buffer this is my code : ` #!/usr/bin/env python3 import numpy as np from harvesters.core import Harvester h = Harvester() print (h.add_cti_file('/opt/cvb/drivers/genicam/libGevTL.cti')) print("file",h.files) print("update",h.update()) print ("list",h.device_info_list) ia = h.create_image_acquirer(serial_number="S1220901") print ("ia",ia) ia.remote_device.node_map.Width.value = 5120 ia.remote_device.node_map.Height.value = 5120 ia.remote_device.node_map.PixelFormat.value = 'Mono8' ia.start_acquisition(run_in_background=False) print("device",ia.device) ia.remote_device.node_map.AcquisitionStart.value = True with ia.fetch_buffer(timeout=1) as buffer: # Work with the Buffer object. It consists of everything you need. print ("--------------with1---") print(buffer) print ("--------------with2---") component = buffer.payload.components[0] print ("--------------with3---") # The buffer will automatically be queued. ia.stop_acquisition() ia.destroy() h.reset()` and this is the output python3 camera_nano.py None file ['/opt/cvb/drivers/genicam/libGevTL.cti'] GenTL producer does not implement IFGetParentTL GenTL producer does not implement DevGetParentIF GenTL producer does not implement DSGetParentDev GenTL producer does not implement DSGetNumBufferParts GenTL producer does not implement DSGetBufferPartInfo üëç update None list [(id_='::ID->00-01-0D-C4-C4-CC::10.104.0.10', vendor='Teledyne DALSA', model='NanoXL-M5100', tl_type='GEV', user_defined_name='S1220901', serial_number='S1220901', version=None)] üëç ia <harvesters.core.ImageAcquirer object at 0x7fad91e247f0> üëç device <harvesters.core.Device object at 0x7fad91db30f0> üëç Traceback (most recent call last): üëé File "camera_nano.py", line 47, in üëé with ia.fetch_buffer(timeout=1) as buffer: File "/home/roc1/.local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/harvesters/core.py", line 2725, in fetch_buffer logger=self._logger File "/home/roc1/.local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/harvesters/core.py", line 1129, in init logger=self._logger File "/home/roc1/.local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/harvesters/core.py", line 1262, in _build_payload buffer=buffer, node_map=node_map, logger=logger File "/home/roc1/.local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/harvesters/core.py", line 1438, in init buffer=buffer, node_map=node_map File "/home/roc1/.local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/harvesters/core.py", line 1361, in _build_component logger=self._logger File "/home/roc1/.local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/harvesters/core.py", line 837, in init self._data = self._to_np_array(proxy) File "/home/roc1/.local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/harvesters/core.py", line 867, in _to_np_array h = self._buffer.height File "/home/roc1/.local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/genicam/gentl.py", line 4371, in _get_height return _gentl.Buffer__get_height(self) _gentl.InvalidParameterException: GenTL exception: Parameter not valid or out of range. (Message from the source: Error Inquire buffer info) (ID: -1009) üëé Anyone have any ideas ?? I am using a Genie Nano XL python 3 and Harvester 1.2.8???

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/leitoxve>@leitoxve</denchmark-link> Hi, sorry having kept you waiting. Please make a try with the latest one in the master branch. /Kazunari
